titleStmt.title: Die Jovis, 8 Novembr. 1649 resolved upon the question by the Parliament, that such person or persons who shall ... bring in safe custody ... any person that hath committed, or shall commit any burglary or robbery ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Edward Husband ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information taken from first 5 lines of text.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
